name: JETTY - Just keep going
description:
A short puzzle game that only has one way - forward.

A poem to myself in a form of a game, or a game in a form of a poem. 

JETTY is a short and simple puzzle game. with 10 unique levels to play though JETTY tells you to just keep going even when times are hard.

The controls are very simple and will only require you to press the WASD key for controls. All you need now is the will to keep going and clear the levels.

FEATURES

  • push blocks to make a new path
  • ride on a moving block
  • change platforms to walkable platforms
  • keep going!

The game is ready to play now for free.
